code:
class Solution:
    def specialGrid(self, N: int) -> List[List[int]]:
        grid = [[0]]
        for _ in range(N):
            m = len(grid)
            M = m * m
            size = m * 2
            new = [[0] * size for _ in range(size)]
            for i in range(m):
                for j in range(m):
                    v = grid[i][j]
                    new[i][j + m]     = v + 0 * M
                    new[i + m][j + m] = v + 1 * M
                    new[i + m][j]     = v + 2 * M
                    new[i][j]         = v + 3 * M
            grid = new
        return grid

class Solution:
    def specialGrid(self, n: int) -> List[List[int]]:
        if n==0: return [[0]]
        p=self.specialGrid(n-1)
        d=len(p)
        b=d*d
        m=[[0]*(d*2) for _ in range(d*2)]
        o=[0,b,2*b,3*b]
        for i in range(d):
            for j in range(d):
                v=p[i][j]
                m[i][j+d]=o[0]+v
                m[i+d][j+d]=o[1]+v
                m[i+d][j]=o[2]+v
                m[i][j]=o[3]+v
        return m
